session.deleteAccountDescription: This action is permanent and irreversible. All your data, conversations and connections will be lost forever.

home.intermediateSubtitle: Find places and people on the same wavelength.
home.infoDescription: Choose a category and see nearby places where you can connect with others.

nightlife.description: To go out and meet new people.

premiumPaywall.title: Your upgrade for real encounters
premiumPaywall.subtitle: More visibility. More connections. More live moments.

unlimitedLikes.title: Unlimited Likes
unlimitedLikes.subtitle: Like as many people as you want and increase your chances of connection.

seeWhoLiked.title: See who liked you
seeWhoLiked.subtitle: Discover who has already shown interest and jump straight to matches.

priorityLikes.title: Priority Likes
priorityLikes.subtitle: Your likes are highlighted and appear first for other people.

unlimitedRewind.title: Unlimited Rewind
unlimitedRewind.subtitle: Go back to profiles whenever you want and never miss an opportunity.

visibilityControl.title: Visibility Control
visibilityControl.subtitle: Decide who can see you and keep your presence more private.

seeWhoViewedYou.title: See who viewed you
seeWhoViewedYou.subtitle: Discover who crossed paths with you at bars, cafes, parties, and other places.

turboIncluded.title: Connect+ included (5 per week)
turboIncluded.subtitle: Appear more at the place and gain instant visibility when you need it.

earlyCheckin.title: Check-in+ (5 per week)
earlyCheckin.subtitle: Appear at the place before arriving and increase your chances of being discovered.

pings.title: Pings unlocked (5 per week)
pings.subtitle: Send special social signals to get someone's attention.

premiumPaywall.terms: Your subscription renews automatically for the same price and period unless cancelled in your {{store}} settings. By confirming the subscription, you agree to our

manageSubscription.title: You have Bumpti Premium
manageSubscription.subtitle: View your benefits and change your plan anytime.

welcome.title: Welcome to Bumpti
welcome.subtitle: Connect with people who frequent the same places as you.

slide1.title: Connections that happen live
slide1.text: Discover who's at the same places as you, in real-time. No waiting, no missed matches.

slide2.title: Places you already know
slide2.text: Bars, nightclubs, universities, cafes, gyms, and parks. Connect with people who frequent the same spots as you.

slide3.title: Privacy in your control
slide3.text: You decide when to appear and to whom. Your location is only shared when you want.

slide4.title: Ready to get started?
slide4.text: Create your profile, choose your favorite places, and start making real connections.

onboarding.heroSubtitle: Discover and connect with those who frequent the same places as you. Make friends, chat, and expand your social network
onboarding.title:
Meet real people,
in real places
onboarding.subtitle: Discover and connect with those who frequent the same places as you. Make friends, chat, and expand your social network
onboarding.socialAuthError: Could not sign in. Please try again.
onboarding.termsPrefix: By continuing, you agree to our
onboarding.phoneAuthTitle: Log in with your phone number
onboarding.phoneAuthSubtitle: We will send a verification code via SMS
onboarding.phoneInfo: By continuing, you will receive an SMS with the verification code. Message and data rates may apply.
onboarding.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
onboarding.codeNotReceived: Didn't receive the code? Check if the number is correct or try again in a few moments.
onboarding.ageSubtitle: We need your birth date to personalize your experience and confirm you are over 18.
onboarding.ageError: You must be at least 18 years old
onboarding.ageErrorTooOld: Please enter a valid birth date
onboarding.ageMinimum: You must be 18 or older to use this app.
onboarding.genderSubtitle: Choose the gender that best represents you. This helps create more real and respectful connections.
onboarding.genderUpdateInfo: You can update this information at any time in settings.
onboarding.genderCustomPrompt: Want to tell more about yourself? We're listening ðŸ’¬
onboarding.genderNotFound: Didn't find your identity? Tap here to let us know.
onboarding.genderSuggestDescription: Help us be more inclusive! Share your suggestion and we'll consider adding it.
onboarding.genderSuggestionSuccess: Thanks for the suggestion! We'll review and consider adding it soon.
onboarding.connectWithTitle: Who would you like to connect with?
onboarding.connectWithInfo: This information will not be displayed publicly.
onboarding.connectWithPrivacy: This information is only used to show people you want to connect with.
onboarding.connectWithFooter: You can change this later in settings.
onboarding.intentionTitle: What are you looking for here?
onboarding.intentionSubtitle: We use this to show people with the same goals as you
onboarding.photosSubtitle: Select 3 to 9 photos at once. Profiles with more photos generate more connections!
onboarding.bioSubtitle: A good bio increases your chances of connection. Be authentic!

favoritePlaces.title: What are your favorite spots?
favoritePlaces.subtitle: Increase your connections by choosing your favorite spots.
favoritePlaces.locationNeeded: To suggest places near you, we need your location.

cityNotAvailable.title: We haven't reached there yet!
cityNotAvailable.subtitle: Bumpti is currently available in select cities only. But you can finish signing up and we'll notify you as soon as we arrive in your area.

onboarding.locationSubtitle: To find people and places near you, we need your location. You can disable this at any time
onboarding.locationPrivacy: Your location data is private and secure
onboarding.locationDeniedMessage: You denied location permission. You can enable it later in app settings.
onboarding.locationError: Error requesting location permission. Please try again.
onboarding.notificationsSubtitle: We use notifications to alert you about important updates in the app.
onboarding.notificationsDeniedMessage: You denied notification permission. You can enable it later in app settings.
onboarding.notificationsError: Error requesting notification permission. Please try again.

university.title: What school do you attend?
university.subtitle: Connect with people who attend the same university or college as you.
university.showOnHomeSubtitle: Get quick access to what's happening on your campus

onboarding.completeSubtitle: Enter a place and see who shares your tastes.

auth.emailInputSubtitle: We'll send a verification code to your email
auth.emailInfo: By continuing, you'll receive a 6-digit code via email.

categoryResults.subtitle: See the most popular places in the region

favorites.title: Your favorite places are quiet
favorites.description: Save the places you like most to know exactly when the buzz starts.

trending.title: The vibe is warming up
trending.description: We haven't detected a buzz peak yet, but the best connections usually happen by surprise.

nearby.title: Exploring new horizons?
nearby.description: We didn't find places around here. How about trying another category?

communityFavorites.title: Where is everyone meeting?
communityFavorites.description: The community is still discovering the secrets of this region. Be the first to favorite a place!

default.title: No places in this category here
default.description: There are no places in this category here yet. How about exploring another vibe? ðŸ‘€

search.title: No places found
search.description: We couldn't find anything with that name. Try simplifying or searching by category.

ranking.title: Still no popular places
ranking.description: No one has checked in to places near you yet. Be the first!

cityNotAvailable.title: Coming soon to your city
cityNotAvailable.description: We're currently available in select cities only. We'll notify you when Bumpti arrives in your area!

categoryResults.infoText: Places are ordered by popularity. Tap a card to see more details and connect with people there.
categoryResults.searchFallback: Didn't find what you were looking for?

placeSearch.emptyDescription: Type the name of a place or choose a suggestion.
placeSearch.noResultsDescription: Try searching with another name or check spelling.

universitySearch.emptyDescription: Type the name of your college or university.

chat.title: Chat
chat.emptySubtitle: Start connecting with people nearby to start a chat.

report.title: Submit report
report.description: The Bumpti team will review your report. The user will not know you reported them.
report.successMessage: Thanks for letting us know. We will review shortly.
report.submitError: Please try again in a moment.
report.detailsHelper: Add a brief description to submit.

chatBlock.blockSuccessMessage: You will no longer receive messages from this user.
chatBlock.blockError: Please try again in a moment.

chatUnmatch.unmatchError: Please try again in a moment.

active.subtitle: The vibe is great!
active.supportText: There are amazing people connected right now. Enter to see who is nearby and chat.
active.microcopy: You will be able to see and chat with people who are at this place right now.

quiet.subtitle: Break the ice
quiet.supportText: It's quiet for now. Mark your presence here and we'll let you know when the buzz starts.

premium.subtitle: You're getting ahead. âš¡
premium.supportText: Premium members can connect before arriving at the place.
premium.microcopy: When you get close, the app will notify you automatically.

locked.subtitle: Oops! You are a bit far.
locked.supportText: To ensure real interactions, you can only connect when you are at the place. If you want to enter now from wherever you are, use Early Check-in with Check-in+.

alreadyConnected.subtitle: You are already connected at {{currentVenue}}!
alreadyConnected.supportText: Do you want to leave there and enter here?
alreadyConnected.microcopy: You can only be connected in one place at a time â€” to keep everything real and authentic.

leaveConfirmation.title: Disconnect from place?
leaveConfirmation.description: By leaving, you stop appearing to those at this place.

profileSwiper.emptyStateDescription: Check back later to see new people!

placePeople.premiumDescription: Premium subscribers can see and connect with people anywhere, even without being physically present!
placePeople.benefit2: Connect before going to the place

emptyState.title: No one here yet
emptyState.description: You are the first! When other people show up, we'll let you know.

gender.title: Gender
gender.description: Choose who you want to see and connect with. This only affects your feed.

age.title: Age
age.description: Select the age range of people you want to connect with.
age.hint: Drag handles to adjust age range

connectionType.title: Connection type
connectionType.description: Choose one or more intentions to find people with the same goals.

verified.title: Verified only
verified.switchDescription: When enabled, you only see verified profiles and are only visible to them.
verified.verifyToEnable: Verify your profile to enable this filter.

chatActions.unmatchDescription: Remove the match. You will no longer be able to message each other.
chatActions.blockDescription: Blocked person will no longer be able to see your profile or message you.
chatActions.reportDescription: Use this option to report inappropriate or suspicious behavior.

report.title: Why do you want to report {{name}}?
report.subtitle: Select the reason for reporting

placeReport.title: What's wrong?
placeReport.subtitle: Help us keep information accurate

placeReport.error: Could not send. Please try again.

chatActions.unmatchDescription: If you unmatch, you will lose the connection and won't be able to message each other anymore.
chatActions.blockDescription: {{name}} will no longer be able to see your profile, message you, or interact with you on Bumpti.
